Name: MCP Tool - Get Sage Intacct Object Model Definition
Description:
Retrieves metadata (field catalogue) for a Sage Intacct object. Use this to discover valid field names, data types, and pick‑list values before using the SageQueryObjects tool. 

Use the tool SageGetAllObjectNames if object names are not known.

Properties.Name: Text
Properties.Value: This Workflow invokes the Sage Intacct REST node to get an object's model definition from Sage Intacct. The response is mapped to the Variable Bar node as the result.

Nodes.Name: VariableBar
Nodes.LongDescription: We define the inputs and the outputs on the Variable Bar. This is used to generate a schema which the LLM uses when invoking the Workflow.

Properties.Description: Resource name, in the form `<application-name>/<resource name>`. Note that some services have 3-part names, such as `company-config/document-sequence/get-next-sequence`. For custom objects use `platform-apps/nsp::<object-name>`.
Properties.Name: name
result

Nodes.Name: Formatter
Nodes.LongDescription: On error, we suppress default result, the error details are returned directly to the LLM—no error object construction required.

Nodes.Name: Error
Nodes.LongDescription: We still want the Workflow to provide an error so that the LLM is aware that an error has occurred. Errors can be handle like this, or a custom error object can be returned,
